attribute.description: ID of the attribute which will be modified by this modifier.
attribute.markdownDescription: ID of the attribute which will be modified by this modifier.

operation.description: The operation which will be performed by this modifier.
operation.markdownDescription: The operation which will be performed by this modifier.

value.description: The value to use for the modifier operation.
value.markdownDescription: The value to use for the modifier operation.

name.description: A descriptive name for the modifier, describing where it comes from.
name.markdownDescription: A descriptive name for the modifier, describing where it comes from.

type.description:
[Data Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/attributed_attribute_modifier)

An [Object](object.md) used to specify how a specific attribute should be modified. Basically an [Attribute Modifier](attribute_modifier.md) with an additional `attribute` field.
type.markdownDescription:
[Data Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/attributed_attribute_modifier)

An [Object](object.md) used to specify how a specific attribute should be modified. Basically an [Attribute Modifier](attribute_modifier.md) with an additional `attribute` field.
